page.title: 14INDUSTRY IN BERWICK
page.content: Most large-scale industries are sited on the Tweedmouth Industrial Estate: e.g McCreath,Simpson and Prentice (Barley malters),Jus-Rol(pastry confectioners),Pringles(quality fashion knitwear).Also based here are transport and motor servicing firms _ Johnsons Transport,Bosche,Cochranes, Classic Cars,Tyre Services,Semple Motors _ and agricultural machinery services(Sherrif's,Alvin Blanche grain driers,Woods). In Berwick itself,the main employers are service industries with printing (Howe and Blackhall,Martins,Shiell and Morrison and the Berwick Advertiser) electricity,gas and telephone servicing and the supermarkets (Co-op, Wm.Low, Woolworth,Boots) as the major employers. There is another smaller industrial estate on the North side of Berwick.
